item.title: Learning from Rapid Development: Building a mini LoL stats App in 5 hours
item.description: Okay, it wasn’t exactly a strict 5 hours, but I spent around 3 hours prior to development, planning and collecting resources to use for development. The goal of this challenge was to build a league of legends stats app using only my full stack Javascript knowledge (fun!) Hours 1, 2, and 3 After receiving the task, I outlined the 3 main things I needed to research: Riot Games API NodeJS and ReactJS boilerplates Which project architecture would suit this project The Riot API One of the things I enjoyed about this project was being able to take the time to read up on Riot’s API.

item.title: Build and deploy a static website with Hugo
item.description: Overview Here is a list of technologies we will be using in this article: Hugo (Static-site generator) Github/Github-Pages (Hosting) Let’s get started! Setting up Github Github offers Free hosting for static pages, so we’ll be using that for our workflow and hosting our personal site. Navigate to github and create the repository that will hold your static files with the name: [your-github-username].github.io Don’t clone your repo yet; we’ll get to that soon.
